content.detailedDescription: Went outside saw bright star, but object moved latterally and began to get closer and then further away for the duration of 1.5 hours. object diamond shaped and organge and green. live very close to army aviation hq with many ahp's for many years. never seen object do these movements before, i am certain that this movement could not be flares. i have numerous videos to document.
content.summary: Rapid erratic movement of diamond shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way to havasu city, lake havasu in 2004 when we got lost on a side road, we were to have exited on the arizona side of the 95 but made a mistake and exited highway 95 on the california side instead. my wife and i drove, actually she drove, i was sitting shotgun and looking at the night sky which was clear and visible for miles. after checking the map and figuring out we were going the wrong way for about an hour maybe less, near the chemehuevi mountain reserve (forgive the spelling) i said we needed to turn around, which we did. on our way back north on highway 95 to california state 40 i was looking out north east when i noticed something in the sky.

now this was something i had never seen before, and i really don't want to say anything about it, but it is driving me nuts not knowing. in the sky as i looked out the window was a bluish green meteor, or i hope it was, i immediately yelled for my wife to stop the car so she could see. but she yelled back at me something about scaring the hell out of her, and she wasn't about to stop out here in the darkness, in no mans land.

i watched this thing for about two to three minutes, the flames were fantastic, not real bright easy to the differentiate the colors within the flames. it looked like something you would have seen in the movies, thing is, as i watched it go down i rolled my window down waiting for the impact. i'm former military and have seen impacts made by a 105 recoiless, this made no sound nor did it break up into shrapnel. i was so excited to see this, but i must've scared my wife because she said she was not stopping for anything. it dropped down below the horizon, and i waited for the explosion, but nothing. i wish i could remember the day it happened. 

i remember passing needles airport on our way back to the 40, which we then proceeded to make our way to havasu city, lake havasu to visit her aunt. i didn't want people to think i was crazy so i didn't say anything, tonight i watched larry king live and he had dan akroyd on the show, said if you see anything report it, you guys would sort it out. hope it was nothing, but it scared the hell out of me, yet at the same time i was pissed off my wife didn't stop, i wanted so badly to get out and check this out. respectfully albert r. munoz jr.
content.summary: Green bluish color, flying low to the ground over the north, eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
July 5 1977/1978.   time 5;30 am   rawlins, wyoming

pulled out from my drive way with my son mike on the way to work.  facing west as we pulled out,  we saw a bright oval object,like a bright sun. it could not have been the sun traveling from north to south horizontally and about 2 oclock high.   my son was twelve years old. "i said look"  we saw the object at the same time it lasted for about six to eight seconds  going from right to left, suddenly it just dissapeared. it vanished in front of our eyes.  i asked my son, "tell me exactly what you saw".  he described exactly what i had seen.  he described a bright orange object traveling horizontly across the sky from right to left and then it vanished. 
 that was a long time ago but we still remember it as it was yesterday.  we never found out what it was, but it was however a ufo, it could have been nothin else. we did not report it, but it was too bizzare to have been any thing else.  i still live in the same place and every day when i get up at 5,am and look up to see if i see it again. i never have.
content.summary: Bright orange light moving from right to left for about eight seconds

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in the living room of a third story condo watching a movie around 9:30 pm. the sliding glass windows faces south towards a manmade lake. i suddenly noticed a bright light in the sky that didn't seem to be moving like an airplane or helicopter. it hovered about 500 feet above the center of charlotte and did not move. there were no flashing lights like an airplane or helicopter would have. it had an orangish light eminating from it. two unidentified craft suddenly moved toward it and one hovered close for about 3 minutes and the other moved away and was determined to be some sort of  airplane. the second craft finally moved away from the unidentified object in the sky.

we sat and watched in awe as the unidentified object slowly started moving up in the sky about 100 feet up and towards the condo. it sat there for another five minutes before going back to the spot it was in to begin with. the light never changed shape, color, or brightness. 

the owner of the condo suggested that we take pictures of the unidentified craft. we took several pictures of the things in the sky. one of the witnesses stayed out on the deck and watched as yet another unidentified craft approach the first craft. it also hovered near for a few minutes before it too, took off in the opposite direction.

around 10:00pm, we noticed that the object in the sky started to diminish in size and brightness, until it disappeared in the night sky. we looked at the pictures and question whether or not anyone could make out anything in them, but we are still enclosing them just in case.
content.summary: Possible ufo spotted hovering near university area

content.detailedDescription: I was just returning home from work admiring venus when to the right and above my head i saw an object moving.  it is common for airplanes to fly by but this was to small to be an airplane and to high.  it was one solitary constant light.  no glimmer, no pulsating, just a stagnate light.  i tried to take a few pictues with my phone but they did not turn out well.  it could be a satellite or a jet that shoots across the sky, but again the light was constant and didnt shake or anything.  it shot towards the east, southeast,  and was out of view in a matter of 1-2 minutes.  it steadily moved across the sky, it was very sleek the way the object moved and fast.  it was really fast.  it got to be so far i couldnt see it anymore.  i also, tried to take a video but all my video phone recorded was black sky with a street light at the bottom.  it just was so silent, that is the thing that received my attention the most. it was right over my head and a minute or 2 later was faded into the horizon.  it was a white light as well and didnt change color.
content.summary: Bright object flies silently across the sky in a matter of minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home on 1750 to the east. at first i thought it was a light on top of a drilling rig. the in the same position the light just hung in the same position over the tree line. i realized it was not a light on top of anything. i think it would be 50 to 60 feet off the ground. i was able to see it in the same position until i pulled in to the driveway facing east also. i lost it in the tree line for a second and then was.I got out of the car as fast as i could but it was to late. my wife witnessed the whole thing with me.
content.summary: 3 oclock over tree line hanging orb

content.detailedDescription: My husband  and my self  lived in the mountains in quebec  . about 7 mile from the  usa  border  near vermont  . it was early in the evening but was dark,  but clear sky   no moon    when  we looked towards the border and saw  a large  and i mean large  moveing object comeing our way.  dont know how high it was in the sky or if it was in orbert . dont think so  but the funny part was it had this halo  and it was comeing  and then it turned  and made a left turn and went over the mountain/  but right behind it there was a biger one and it did the same thing /  my feelings are  that  thay knew we were there as it was almost to our house maybe  a mile away. we had   a very good view of the hevens as we lived  in the country/ no street lights /and we both saw many ufos  many  different shapes large and small,  and other things in the sky/ one  was like a small moon and it moved along the river one  night/ i was in bed and i was looking out the window ,   i thaught that a funny place for the moon, so i got up out of bed and went down  stairs  and by that time it was in the trees . but it started to move and  went over magog lake . so i called my daughter and told her to look out the back as she lives near the lake .  she wouldet go out with out her husband . and when thay did   thay watched it and it stayed over the lake for an hour, and  start to move  and it went  right over there house and high speed and a big bang and a flash and it was gone i saw the flash   but i dident hear the bang. there are a lot of sightings in that part of the country . well thats my story  as i remember it . how it made me feel when i saw all of the siteings  was i know   there is other life form out there, dont know if thay are like us but with ships that size and  speed that thay go and can  stay in one piece /makes you wonder as for my daughter and her husband thay both  landed on  the porch floor on there buts/ and thay told me not to call them if i see any thing else  and i never did  even thoe we saw many more. thay had a hard time to get to sleep, as for me i still look up and watch all the time here in alberta  / as i moved here  i know i will see more as i have the eye for them
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It looked like  a small moom with a halo around it , and  the first one was smaller

content.detailedDescription:
Recent ufo sighting:

 

tanya roberts

elcajon ca

4/26,and 4/28 2010

 

 

standng s.E. on my balcony facing the mountains on 4/26/10 at aproximately  8:45 pm  in elcajon ca 92019.  the sky was  clear,  i saw unidentified flying objects.   the ufos had white lights and appeared small and were moving extremely fast.   they  were moving vertically, sideways, up and down, moving  fast distances in a matter of seconds.

 

on the evening of the 26th i saw 6 unidentified objects in the sky i was able to capture 2 at diffrent times.

as they stayed positioned,  i noticed that the ufo���s were moving rapidly . also i noticed a helicopter was flying toward the ufos .The ufo ���s  started flying rapidly moving fast distances in a matter of seconds,  not stopping ,even while the helicopter was getting near the ufo���s.

 

 standing s.E. on my balcony facing the mountains on 4/28/10, around 12:30 am.  the ufo���s were putting on a light show.

 

   in  elcajon ca 92019

 

on the 4-28-10 around 12:30 am,   i walked out side  on my balcony and noticed a light layer of fog.   i saw around 100  ufo���s moving super fast right above me.   there were so many they were  still visible  even after 30 min of viewing them.   i noticed a helicopter approaching at the right side of the mountain approximently south east of my balcony.  the helicopter was spectating the ufos and did not go near the ufo���s as the night before, perhaps because there 80-100 more of them.

 all you had to do was look up and they were right  on the horizon.

 on 4-28-10 between 8:00 pm and 8:30  pm  same day but pm, i saw another ufo moving vertically and  horizontally  i could only see one light.  i  also saw what looked like military airplanes, but i did not see the massive amount of ufo���s as i saw in the am of 4/28/10.  i saw another object in the sky around 8-9 o'clock pm thurs. and i woke up around 4:15 am 4/30/10 this morning, i have not been getting good sleep with all of these sightings , i took 4 picd and a video on my cell phone.  


the larger image pictures are from 4/29 and 4/30/2010
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw these objects in early evening to early morning from 4/26 to 4/30 last ufo object seen this morning 4:30 am.  i can tell you that i ived in san diego most of my life . seen military & comm. planes. i've never seen any  flying crafts like these.

content.detailedDescription:
Let my dog out to go to bathroom back porch of house notice from my left eye an orb not to

bright venus or mars was brighter.
 
the orb went west to east as usually through here. watch it till out of 

site. no sound or flashing lights or running lights. just an orb.

speed slow but consistent pace. size of orb small. i think it was an orb

i've seen on youtube when people grab their video cams.


christopher seum
moundsvill, west virginia 26041-1336
content.summary: Orb over moundsville.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were driving home from new brunswick, and were about 2 miles away from the easton pa exit on 287-n when my wife remarked on a plane in the sky. i often see commercial airplanes when driving on this route in the evening, and i expected nothing unusual. when i looked in the sky, at about 5 minutes after 11:00pm, i saw (what appeared to me) to be a plane with 2 bright lights, that seemed to be flying relatively low or "close" compared to most of the planes i see flying in the sky. i looked for the tell-tale blinking red and blue lights on the wings that would indicate it as a normal commerical jetliner, but i did not see any. after about 20 seconds, the craft shifted it's orientation, and i realized it had 3 lights, not 2, and it had a faint triangular shape against the sky. at this point i still thought it was possibly a commercial airliner briefly, but i felt confused upon seeing the unusual shape, and size (or altitude) of the aircraft. it seemed either unusually close or unusually large for a craft to be flying overhead, and it moved relatively quickly (in about the span of 40 seconds) west towards the horizon, where it again was only visible from a "side" view, and only 2 lights were visible. it did not move erratically, but simply crossed over from one horizon to the other. at this point, i was taking the easton pa exit onto route-78, and as i was driving, i lost line-of-sight of the craft. before i lost line of sight with it, i did notice it was producing a 4th, very faint, blinking red light, that seemed to have a pattern of "blink-blink-stop" about one a second. this last quality of the craft leads me to believe it was probably man-made, although i have no idea what it was. suggestions by others that it was a "b-2 stealth bomber" or similar military craft seem plausible, but on the other hand, a b-2 bomber would have to be flying awfully low for the lights appear that "large" from our viewpoint, and i have no idea if such military craft have lights arranged on their bottoms in that manner. i still feel i saw something very unusual and i cannot really say for sure what it was i saw.
content.summary: Large ufo, with 3 bright lights passes over 287-n highway.

content.detailedDescription: Uncle woke up between 3 am and 3:30am seen light above tree tops it lighted area to the point uncle said it was like the sun was out ... he ask me that morning if i had seen it dew to placement of camper it was not visible to me small windows ... also made a statement if they leave me alone i will leave them alone ... this is also the only place i have ever seen anything i could not explain that might relate to the ufo field ... in 2007 i seen a light moving in the the clouds very erratic movements nothing man made would have moved in the way the light i seen moved
content.summary: Light above tree line

content.detailedDescription:
The witness, who is a close friend of mine but wishes to remain anonymous, was traveling north on the 110 freeway, about a mile from the 405 interchange. the witness stated he was traveling along at approximately 85 mph. the time was exactly 11:30pm. he knows this because he left his friend's home at around 11:20pm, and was on his way home. after the sighting, he noted the time, then sent a text to me. i received his text at exactly 11:33pm. 

the witness was driving along the freeway, when suddenly, at approximately 45 degrees above the horizon, an unidentified object sped into the view of his windscreen, to the right. the witness stated that it the object was moving extremely fast, faster then anything he had ever seen or imagined, and came to a sudden stop in front of him. he estimate the distance at about a mile away. the object the shined a beam of light directly into the witnesses car, illuminating everything "brighter than daylight". after a few moments of this, the object sped away, so fast that the witness stated that if he had blinked his eyes, he would have thought that it had simply vanished. 

the witness was extremely excited after the event, and felt unusually dehydrated. when he arrived home, he chugged down several bottles of water. he could not sleep all night, thinking about what he had witnessed. 

i should add that this is not the first sighting my friend has reported to me. a few years ago, he and his girlfriend where on there balcony looking out at the ocean when a very colorfully lit craft put on a show for them. she corroborated the story. 

going back even further (approximately eight years ago) the witness had an encounter in malibu, where a strangely lit object flew over his car while he was driving north along the 101 fwy. 

a unique element to the story is that the witness states that his sightings always occur either on the hour, or the half hour. nothing in between. he believes the intelligence behind these craft are letting him know that they have their eyes on him, for purposes unknown. he does not know if they mean him good or harm, so he finds himself both excited, and frightened at the same time. as he related the story to me, he became agitated about it. you could tell he was re-living the event. his speech became choppy and he started to stammer a bit as he became excited. he was glad to have me as someone he could trust and relate his story to. 

beyond these sightings, i know this person to be a very solid individual. he is not prone to telling stories or day dreaming. for the most part, he is a very serious individual.
content.summary: Ufo w bright light flew rapidly into my view, shone a bright light directly at me, then sped away at an unbelievable speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work making a delivery to a grocery store. after i parked my truck, i proceeded to walk around to the front of the grocery store to wait for them to open up, it was 0647am. as i turned the corner of the building to my right, i noticed an object in my left corner-vision, above the tree line between 2 and 3 miles away. this object appeared to be at least twice a high as the tree line and moving slowly from the south to east-northeast.  the sky was clear blue, no clouds at all and the sun was up in the east.  this object had no fins or wings visible of any type and no engines visible. it was simply a straight cigar or cylinder shape with some object below it or attached to it. it had no rotors or wings and made no noise. it moved slowly and straight.  this was absolutely baffling. i have been a fan of ufology for many years, but i never expected to see something this odd and in the bright clear sky. this object flew over the outskirts of rustburg,virginia slightly to the south. in my military career since the late 80's with the navy and army, i have never seen anything like this.  i have worked in naval intelligence 20 years ago, and studied all types of conventional and unconventional aircraft, i'm in the army national guard and have seen uav aircraft in iraq, this was different.(uav's are unmanned aerial vehicles) thanks for listening.  jim
content.summary: Cigar type shape with object hanging below or attached.

content.detailedDescription: Last night i was taking the trash out and look up to see that the stars were out and then noticed right away that a star like object maybe a little brighter then the others was traveling from the west horizon to to the east in a steady speed and not deviating from it's path. it even traveled over a commercial airline that did have blinking lights. it look like it was much higher. i thought it was strange that it didn't have blinking lights like the other plane, so i then started to think it wasn't a plane at all. it traveled to the east until i couldn't see it anymore over the trees. i see where someone in minnesota and someone in indiana seems to have seen the same thing.
content.summary: White star like sphere traveling west to east high in the sky--no blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at 9:12 to have a cig i saw a bright light that caught my attention so i watched it for a sec. it started to move so i called my daughter outside to witness this it started to come towards my house my daughter started to get scared she started to ask me questions that i dont have the answer as it came closer and brighter i started to panic my self so as it was passing over us i took 4 photos 3 of then cant make out but the other picture i have is something to raise questions about as it went over the house there were two airplanes one of them went under they have had to seen that light on the left side of the plane the other airplane was going above the light not to sure if they saw the light but i know their pilots had to have seen it the last photo i have a triangular shape object with a glow around it. i have the picture on my cell phone.. i dont trust to send it out.. but i am more than willing for someone to come and tell me if what i have is a ufo.. i have a crediable witness my 13 yr old daughter.. she is scared of this incident.. i would like for someone to please help me find out what this is on my phone you can clearly see it is no airplane. i would like to know if someone could enhance this photo that i have .. without the zoom on i can clearly see it a perfect triangle.   thank you again for you time.. hope to hear from you soon
content.summary: Went outside for a cig and seen a light rise above a star and slowly come toward me ..

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 1:30am on 29 apr, i decided to use the sun obliteration photo technique on the full moon.
 
using a nikon 5700, then transfd images to pc, then enlarged to 20000x15000, then altered brightness/contrast...
 
i found something very unusual...Very
 
the 2nd photo taken at +10 seconds, the 3rd at +16 from photo 1
 
1  29aprmoon
2  29aprmoon_10sec
3  29aprmoon_16sec
 
included are the hot links to fileden with the original photos and the ones i added text and changed brightness on.  the originals so you can see and alter colors and etc for yourself and to see....Well....I am puzzled as a frog in a toilet
 
please tell me what in the *bleep* i took a photo of!
 
 http://www.Fileden.Com/files/2006/7/2/104905//29aprmoon.Jpg
 http://www.Fileden.Com/files/2006/7/2/104905//29aprmoon copy.Jpg
http://www.Fileden.Com/files/2006/7/2/104905//29aprmoon_10sec.Jpg
 http://www.Fileden.Com/files/2006/7/2/104905//29aprmoon_10sec copy.Jpg
http://www.Fileden.Com/files/2006/7/2/104905//29aprmoon_16sec.Jpg
http://www.Fileden.Com/files/2006/7/2/104905//29aprmoon_16sec copy.Jpg
 
oh, on the original photos, yes they are dark...Lol, the flash was disabled, the moon rests/is masked behind a mounted
susan b anthony coin, the moon is 'slightly' above dead center in all shots.

i also sent this information to bill of ufo magazine/ufo hunters

to answer the points:
1. just decided to use obliteraton techinque to photograph night sky
2. not noticed until i changed brightness on photos
3. lol...Its not an aircraft, thats for sure
4. no, motion, still photos, but motion is seen from subsequent shots
5. i am dumbfounded!
6. they were not seen with naked eye, enlarged photos showed them
content.summary: Actually, i don't know what i captured on film,..It is very odd

content.detailedDescription:
hello mufon,
   at night on thursday, april 15, 2010, three friends and i went to a beachside park slightly north of venice, florida, for some skywatching.  ufo's are often reported in this southwest part of the state. the night
was clear, and for the first hour we saw nothing moving through the sky except planes and helicopters, both flashing lights and making plenty of motor noise.  about 8:31 we noticed a small cluster of lights moving together toward us from over the gulf -- completely silent with no lights flashing. as they they moved closer to the beach, a bright beam of light suddenly shot down from the group of moving lights, scanning a small area of shallow water offshore for only about 10 to 15 seconds. the cluster then passed over the beach about a quarter mile south of where we were, disappearing inland toward the east.
  luckily i captured two photos, thinking that when i processed them in photoshop i'd see the lights connected to some outline of a plane or helicopter. the mysterious five lights are very small in the original raw
images, so i had to enlarge and crop the images quite a bit, lightening them overall and increasing the contrast to reveal stars against the dark sky.  although the lights are pixilated in these enlargements, it appears that they are not attached to a solid body of any kind (unless it is invisible.) between the five lights, there are stars shining from behind and through the areas where we might expect to see some indication of a fuselage or other structure supporting the lights.  what are your thoughts?  naturally, we are quite curious but not surprised, since all
of have seen ufos before. (enlarge to 200% to see a bit more detail.)
  in the data file of my camera, the attached file #1 was taken at 20:32:27, and file #2 was taken at 20:32:49. you can see in these two images that the lights moved in relation to background stars. for file #3,
i exaggerated the contrast dramatically, still looking for some kind of
outline of a solid body or structure to which the lights were attached --
nothing seen.
  if you would like to look at the original raw images, i can send them so you can see that no object in the photos was added, deleted, moved or altered in any way.  
  my three friends can attest to witnessing this event.
 
sincerely,
 
pete carmichael
content.summary: At night , five silent, unblinking lights (seemingly not attached to a solid supporting structure), appeared for about 2 minutes over coast of  southwest florida.

content.detailedDescription: As a marine i was assigned to temporary duty at the marine base in oceanside california to help with reactive armor modifications on the armored amphibious landing vehicle.  i was working the second shift starting at midnight and lasting for 12 hours.  after working the first portion of my shift i went on break approximately 2-3 hours after my shift began.  because of the amphibious nature of the landing attack vehicles, the facility where the vehicles were kept was an inlet to the ocean.  i walked outside toward the water and found a quite place to eat a snickers candy bar and drink a mountain dew soda.  the night was clear and there was no light around except for the light from the moon.  as i relaxed and enjoyed my break i noticed what i thought was something moving under the surface of the water in the bay.  as it approached closer i noticed that it was not one object but three triangular shaped objects, i further realized as it approached that what i was seeing was not something in the water, but rather the reflection of something above moving by.  i stood up and looked up to see three completely smooth black triangles flying in a triangular formation.  the objects moved slowly at no more than 500 ft. altitude, making no sound, and emitting no light or any evidence of a propulsion system, and i could not tell the thickness of the objects as they were almost directly above me.  the craft were approximately 50 to 75 feet from tip to tip, shaped as equilateral triangles.  the only reason i was able to see the objects is because they passed under the moon revealing the shape.  as they continued passing by i was unable to keep a visual on the objects after they passed under the moon.  i remember feeling astonished and a bit confused because i had never seen anything like it before.  i told no one about the sighting until years later, as i was afraid of being ridiculed, and assumed no one would believe me anyway.
content.summary: Witnessed three black triangle objects moving slowly above under 500 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got home from my cousins place with my mrs and decided to take my dog for a walk, we got about 20 metre up the street when i heard some weird bird noises from one of the nearby trees (i think they where bats ) we continued on down the path, then i heard a lady yelling some profanities and heard a car schreec off down the road i was thinking to myself "must be a full moon" as we walked into the local highschool football oval where i always walk  my dog i instantly noticed wha i thought was a bright orange star in the south east direction ( i was standing at cranbourne high secondary college in cranbourne victoria, 45 min from melbourne) i looked at it for a little while then thought "huh? is that a chopper or just a bright star? i turned my head to see if i could hear any noises, no obvious sounds, so i thought "must just be a star" as my dog was having a sniff i noticed a guy taking out some trash or some bottles or something from the high schools theatre, i think they had a show on. i watched my dog for a little while, then about 3 minutes later after witnessing the object i looked up and noticed it was much closer, it had moved about 25c in the night sky and was headed my way, i was looking sth east and it was headed nth west, i watched it intensely trying to figure out if it was a plane or what, i listened and noticed again there was no obvious noise, i could see flashing lights on it similar to what a plane or chopper has and again i thought "uh, must be a plan, but as this thing got closer i noticed it didnt have the shape of a common aircraft, it was almost silent but then i notice there was a faint jet noise trailing the object, however the noise was nothing like a commercial jet plane or anywhere near as loud.

the thing kept cruising along and must have been about 5 - 8 kilometres away and if i where to describe its size would say it was twice the size of a commercial airplane. so as i stared at it i noticed the lights first off, they where a deep red and orange, first the red would glow in an odd kind of pattern and then the orange would go off around the sides, the red lights seemed to be coming from underneath the craft and the orange from either on top or around the sides, if i where to count the lights i would say there was about a dozen small red lights on the underneath and i have no idea how many orange ones, the craft seemed to be a kind of odd diamond shape, but had 3d qualities to it, speed would have been about 150 - 300 km per hour.

i felt very exited the whole time. i lost sight of the object because i thought about running home which was only about a hundred metres away to grab my girlfriend but realized that by the time i get there it would be gone, as this went through my head the object vanished behind the trees and then got too far.

personally i think this was a military object... i think..
thats all.
content.summary: Saw a diamond shape ufo near my home with glowing red and orange lights cruising through the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in car awaiting my friend to run an errand.  i decided to do some overdue skywatching from our parkinglot two blocks east of disneyland as i sat with the window down. i noticed this faint (due to excessive lights in the area) but visible light effortlessly navigating through the sky from a southeast approach towards the northwest.  all of a sudden it took a tight u-turn towards the northeast and seemed to disappear/phase out.  at first, since it was going in a straight line, i thought it was a satellite. i was trying to recall what approach they have.  then, when the turn took place, i realized it was a ufo.  no starboard or port lights (green or red), only white.
content.summary: Light traveled southeast to northwest made a tight u-turn northeast

content.detailedDescription: Hi my spelling not good so bear with me? i stopped in my truck to take a fatuie break. and i was looking at the stars as i always do because i always immagine wat could be out there? some time ago 1 and half years ago i sore something when i first came to aus? but to scard to say anything because it was strange'' so i kept quit. and from that time i new wat i sore so i started taking more notice as u do '' anyway back to my fatiue break i was wacthing the stars and sudunly these star like objects were moveing around realy strange so i paid more atention to them and thay was moving realy fast from side to side and up and down then like thay was interacting with each over? so i looked away wiped my eyes and thought i was seeing things because of driving my truck on nigths as i am a shift truck driver.. then looked back and they was still diong it thats when i realized wat i was seing was correct' so i quickly lit a smoke and wachted these strange lights like stars playing arond like a balay dance then i moved my eyes to the west a bit to look to se the over stars in the the friying pan shape u no looks like a dimond with a handle on ? so i looked back and thay was going crazy with each over but didint seem to go to far away from each over but then i realiezd i had to go because we get tracked bye gps on are trucks. thay would think i am hanging out ' but i did not report it to eneyone because thay would feel that i was imagerning this exsperence??? i got to go patrick i giong to work now nights '  i will probly never here from use but i would like to here from u to tell u wat i sore a year and half ago bye for now lee?????? it was so strainge''' it was western australia as well?
content.summary: Thay was three of them moving together and stoping realy fast and moving backwards and side 2 side with each over realy fast

content.detailedDescription:
i am currently in a crisis with the repeated sightings of lights in the sky of colombia tn. in the month of april i've had a dozen sightings. the objects range from orange-ish white with a small red lights, on what appears to be the back of the object, to blinking red and white lights with a blue light every now and then. these particular blinking lights were accompanied by yet other objects that had the same light patterns. i counted four individual objects with this same light configuration. i am a little streesed out and want to know what the hell is going on here. the sightings began at the beginning of the month and have not stopped. i wish someone could reach out and tell me what to do with this. i have taken many pics and video with my cell phone and a camera, which i plan on getting developed. the cell phone is full of orbs and unexplained lights.   
                                                       
 
 
                                                        please help,jon
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orangeish white obr moved slowly from south to nw making no noise

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing out on the back porch watching the sunset.  during the last rays of the sun a big bright star traveled from the south west and moved towards denver international airport in the north east, high in the sky.  many airplanes were approaching the airport, and this light out shown them all.  it moved acroos the sky to the horizon and then it moved beyond our view.  silent, but bright.

i looked up to see if it could be the space station, and it was suppose to pass over florida, but i did not see it available for view here in colorado.  spoooky.
content.summary: Bright star traveling sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: I have an ir cctv camera pointed at the northwest sky. was not recording. saw something bright appear traveling west to east soon after dark. unsure exact time. grabbed my 120x90 astro binocs and purple astro laser pointer and proceeded outside. upon focusing of nocs i could discern no detail other than a white sphere. it was about the size venus usually looks maybe a bit bigger. it was high up, traveling quickly, but not faster than regular commercial aircraft. one difference, this craft displayed no blinking lights. at this time i noticed another craft of same type on intercept course from the southwest. no sound. lit second craft up with purple laser for a quick sec. believe craft to be in orbit at this time. both craft disappeared over treeline in the northeast never changing speed or color. about 2 minutes later a 747 appeared traveling east to west above me. saw it up close and personal with my nocs, had to be 30,000 feet or more. this confirmed in my mind these craft were in orbit. possible military space stations/craft carriers? see this type of stuff all the time. just reporting because a lot of other people saw it, as i am watching ufostalker.Com keep looking up.
content.summary: 2 bright lights traveling west to east, high up maybe in orbit

content.detailedDescription: The day after steven hawkins made his announcement or the warning on the assistance of er's i've been seeing them every night at the same time 9:30 pm for about a week now, there's even what appears to be a mother ship. that shows up then disappeares. today's date is april 30
content.summary: Starlike

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:50pm on the evening of 4/29/10, i went into the kitchen to help my 14year old son make his school lunch for his field trip the next day..I went over to the living room window to close the blinds when i looked up into the sky and noticed how clear the night sky was, so i went out the back door to look up at the stars, because as of late me and my boys have been noticing and filming lots of moving stars..We understand some of them might be satalites and space junk, but most of them are zig zagging and tranversing the sky from east to west from north to south and back again, within a 20 minute time span we counted nine unusual star like objects on 4/7/10 at about 8:30pm, and as i was standing there waiting to see more, two balls of light came over the townhome that we live in, and shot across the sky and disappeared over the tree tops...On this night (4/29/10) as i
looked up i noticed, comming from the s.W, a bright star like object, but this one was different, it was lower in the sky, and moved really slow, i was upset that i did't bring out my camcorder to film what i was seeing, all i could do was call out to my 14yr old son aaron, who came outside and we stood there in awe, not knowing what we were looking at...As it came over us my son said "dad, it's a triangle" with a red light in front" sure enough we both could make out a silhouette of a triangle, but with only one star like light in the middle, and a small red light at the front end of the thing...We both called out for my other boys, christopher 15yrs, derek 10yrs and nicholas 7yrs old, they all came outside and saw what we were looking at, eventually it went out of sight over the tree line heading n.E, we were all pretty excited at what we saw..I myself have seen these low flying star like objects in the past, they silently transverse the night sky over greeley, fort collins, and now here in loveland colorado
hopefully one day i can figure out what they are.....
content.summary: Me and my 4 boys observed a star like object transverse the sky...

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out and sat down in my chair which was facing northerly and i saw a star move out from (behind?) another star and shoot quickly from right to left in the night sky.  this lasted only a short period of time, perhaps 6 seconds maximum.  the arc was perhaps 20 (less than 30).  the azimuth was approx. 75.  it simply disappeared.  there was no tail or trail of light.  just what appeared to be a relatively small star moving very, very fast.  i was just lucky i looked up when i did and saw it and followed it.  amazing, really!
content.summary: Saw a star moving rapidly from right to left in the night sky and disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the "big-dipper" and saw this "star" that started moving away from the lower part of the big dipper. i live near a local airport, and see a lot of planes that fly from  dia. all of which have flashing lights. this thing moved like a satellite...But a lot quicker. it was far enough away to look like a star. i guess it move north east.
content.summary: It looked like part of the  big dipper, until it started movin away...

content.detailedDescription:
We three went out to pt. reyes national seashore... all about eighteen years old... we consider making a fire but decide it is likely to call undue attention. in the south east... the clouds on the horizon began to burst with light, as if from within... in no particular pattern, across a hugh stretch of the view from the beach. the whole south, towards sf. this took some twenty minutes... and i remember drawing their attention to it, as if it were required, something so strange. one friend seemed to keep staring downwards, into the sand, almost afraid, especially later on. the other seemed to reel n extasy, excitement. in the north east... a star appeared, but so luminescent, an near to sedentary, that it created a tail... must have hovered there for... fourty minutes... heading up and east. it looked much as an airplane would straight on... but very high up, maybe 45 degrees... ascending to ? 60. in the mean time, as if from the clouds which were bursting, these square lights, diamonds... they seemed, later on, once closer. there were several of them, at least six or so, up to eight or nine at one time... they were silent, did not move in straight lines but seemed to curve about our field of vision, in and out of it at times, but at some point there were many, a couple passed almost directly overhead, four white lights on the points of a diamond, no sound, maybe the size of a golf ball when held from an arms length. all of them seemed square or diamond... i do not remember seeing any moon then, around sunset, nor for at least an hour afterward. in all honesty, it may very well have lasted more than a couple of hours, and i would not remember. we were all three very excited. one friend says, so what? the other friend wouldn't even talk about it with me, until one day i said, "this is a matter of trust." at which point he admitted it, but also, essentially says, so what can we do about it??

   we left in a  hurry, drove home to the east bay... it took me some time to convince myself i was not hallucinating... but this was not the first time!! only the most spectacular, and the one event most likely to have been reported by others, even, yes, ten years after it occurred. iwill always remember that date, because well, of what i saw, but that it was this date, because it is international working man's day, and well, may day, which is two days from today, eleven years ago. i have no hard evidence, but two witnesses who cannot, when it comes down to it, deny what an extraoridinary event we witnessed.
content.summary: Two friends and i see clouds bursting and...

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dog happened to look up and saw this very bright star-like object heading towards the north-east part of the indiana night sky. i thought it might be a plane but could not see red and green blinking lights its was just a steady bright white star moving faster than a plane. there was no clouds just a nice breeze.   
i would say it was about 1000 miles away from me, it was far enough but close enough to see that it was not a plane. 
i looked at my watch and recorded the time 9:13pm and it lasted till 9:15pm until the bright object dissapered behind the tree line. 
i happened to notice that there were two other planes above me that were heading straight for the object they dissapered as well behind the tree line those had blinking red and green lights i don't know if they were following it but it sure looked like it. no photos
content.summary: Very bright star like object flying acoss the northern eastern  indiana sky.
